fractal.tasks package¶

Submodules¶

fractal.tasks.compression_tif module¶

fractal.tasks.compression_tif.compress(in_path, start, end, out_path, delete_in)¶

Compress tiff files

Parameters

  • in_path (str) – directory containing the input files

  • out_path (str) – directory containing the output files

  • start (int) – index of first file to process

  • end (int) – index of last file to process

  • delete_in (bool) – delete input files, and folder if empty

fractal.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr module¶

fractal.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr.sort_fun(s)¶
fractal.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr.yokogawa_to_zarr(in_path, out_path, zarrurl, delete_in, rows, cols, ext, chl_list)¶

Convert Yokogawa output (png, tif) to zarr file

Parameters

  • in_path (str) – directory containing the input files

  • out_path (str) – directory containing the output files

:param str zarrurl : structure of the zarr folder :param bool delete_in: delete input files, and folder if empty :param int rows: number of rows of the plate :param int cols: number of columns of the plate :param str ext: source images extension :param list chl_list: list of the channels
